name: d7c61bff-4831-46dd-9b21-f20b8556675e
displayName: Happy Path - User wants to know about Deductible(FAQ)

text: Hi, I'm your virtual healthcare agent. I can help answer your healthcare claims questions, understand your benefits, and find a doctor. How can I assist you today?

A deductible is the amount of money you need to pay before your health insurance will start to pay a portion of the cost of your care. A deductible is different from the monthly premium you pay via payroll deduction for your overall insurance.

I can further help you and answer your questions about your benefits plan, healthcare claims and assist you to find a doctor.

Okay, glad I could help. A transcript of our conversation will be stored in the messages section of your patient portal. Press 5 if you’re willing to fill out a survey on your experience today. Have a great day!
